alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 31 at 3:08PM CDT until April 01 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Light snow and freezing rain expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and winds gusting as high as 45 mph creating patchy blowing snow. A light glaze of ice is possible this evening. * WHERE...South Cass, Crow Wing, and Aitkin Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Mille Lacs Band, East Lake and, Big Sandy Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Plan on slipper road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; Northern Aitkin; South Aitkin; South Cass
